title: Uber will not require sexual assault victims to sign confidentiality deals
text:
Uber will not require sexual assault victims to sign confidentiality deals 3:26pm EDT - 01:22
Uber Technologies said sexual harassment or assault victims will have the option to settle claims with the ride-hailing service without a confidentiality provision that prevents them from speaking about the incidents. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
Uber Technologies said sexual harassment or assault victims will have the option to settle claims with the ride-hailing service without a confidentiality provision that prevents them from speaking about the incidents. Aleksandra Michalska reports. //reut.rs/2L2UJ7J
